episodes.title: Viva il Re!
episodes.plot: After his father dies, Genny is in charge now. He has to cover Pietros death and take care of the streets.

episodes.title: Hasta la muerte
episodes.plot: Genny involves Gegè, his accountant, in his dirty businesses. Don Giuseppe, Genny's father-in-law, comes back from prison.

episodes.title: Inferno
episodes.plot: Ciro, now in Sofia, has some issues with his new boss' son.

episodes.title: Il filo e la Moira
episodes.plot: Genny tries to close a deal. Scianel gets out of prison.

episodes.title: Sangue Blu
episodes.plot: Genny finds Ciro, who has teamed up with Enzo and his crew. Ciro offers Genny his support, and organizes a heist using Enzo and his people.

episodes.title: Come nascere
episodes.plot: Genny and Ciro's alliance solidifies as they offer an olive branch and opportunity to Schianel, to go against the Federation, with Blue Blood at their disposal.

episodes.title: Sangue del mio sangue
episodes.plot: The Federation take notice of their profits dropping. They spot Blue Blood's operation, and offer him important territory for his mastermind's head.

episodes.title: Guerra aperta
episodes.plot: Enzo and crew are under attack. Ciro convinces him not to react on impulse advising him to come up with a plan to exploit the weaknesses of the opponents.

episodes.title: Giuda!
episodes.plot: Ciro wants a ceasefire, but it doesn't come without a quid pro quo; Enzo can finally enjoy all he's achieved, but the good times don't last.

episodes.title: Insieme
episodes.plot: In an unwinnable position, Genny sends Patrizia to agree terms of surrender. He and Ciro go to Enzo and hope he will listen to reason.

episodes.title: Fede
episodes.plot: Azzurra and Pietrino have come to be in the Confederate's sights. To save them, Genny is forced to work out a secret plan whose variables are endless.

episodes.title: Per sempre
episodes.plot: Ciro, Genny and Enzo sign the peace with the Confederates, obtaining part of their territories.
